name: Honkai Impact 3rd: Elysian Reverie
storyline: In the unreachable Deep End, the discipliner awaits before the door to the end. O visitor, knock on the last door. Uncover the secrets buried in the past, and go beyond... your fated death.
summary:
Version 5.6 of Honkai Impact 3rd, which includes:
• New Valkyrie: Reverist Calico
• New Featured Event: Starless Nights
• New Elysian Realm Chapter: Flame-Chasers' Trials Chapter 3
• Elysian Realm Rework
• ...and more!

videos.name: Teaser
videos.title: New Concept Trailer: Into the Deep - Honkai Impact 3rd
